title: PVP.net client crashing
body: I have just done the windows 10 update and also the LoL patch 6.15 and every time i enter champ select everything is fine. It is when it opens the client to load the game is when ill get a bugsplat error and not be able to play the game. Can anyone please help me troubleshoot this problem. I have already repaired LoL and have also uninstalled and reinstalled the game. I have also checked to make sure my Nvidia drivers are updated and they are.

replies.body: nah im tired of trying  your guides that dont work ill just either stop playing or wait for a patch that you guys actually take time on developing

Since you mentioned that this happened after some recent Windows Updates, I recommend rolling those updates back to see if it resolves this. If it doesn't, I recommend working through our [bugsplat & crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it addresses the most common fixes for this issue.
